QuestData.Title: Fresh Frostsabers
QuestData.Description: Doesn't that smell great? My smoked meats get top dollar, and nobody else provides the exotic flavors I've got out here in the hills. And it's efficient; you just do the hunting for a small fee, and my other fine friends drag the beasts back here for skinnin' and smokin'!$B$BI've got the market cornered on Frostsaber meat right now. Absolutely delicious stuff, makes great sausages. Head out and hunt those cats just west of here, and we'll call that a start!
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: You keep huntin' and I'll keep smokin'!
QuestData.CompletionText: Those frostsabers aren't going to kill, skin, and smoke themselves!
QuestData.RewardText: Alright! Don't stop now, we're after the big ones next!
